meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>slow</kanji> <kanji>carve</kanji> is so slow. If you carve something slowly, it will take you a long time. You will <vocabulary>be late</vocabulary> with a slow carve like that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
